channel.title: Famous Statisticians on Stat 150 at Cal Poly
channel.description: Recent content in Famous Statisticians on Stat 150 at Cal Poly

item.title: Gertrude Cox
item.description: The field of statistics is certainly wide open to women. If you are willing to take the mathematics and science courses and then work very hard â€¦ there are all sorts of opportunities to go as far as you wish. - Gertrude Cox

item.title: Hadley Wickham
item.description: One of the attributes that has made me successful is that I am exquisitely sensitive to frustration. - Hadley Wickham
